H0.text: Which town in Berkshire was the site of two Civil War battles - in 1643 and 1644. Reading

H1.text: Which town in Berkshire was the site of two Civil War battles - in 1643 and 1644. Windsor

H2.text: Which town in Berkshire was the site of two Civil War battles - in 1643 and 1644. Maidenhead

H3.text: Which town in Berkshire was the site of two Civil War battles - in 1643 and 1644. Newbury

A4.text: The first and second battles of Newbury occurred during the Civil War, 1643-6.

A5.text: The First Battle of Newbury took place in late September 1643 in Newbury, Berkshire.

A6.text: The Second Battle of Newbury was fought in Speen, adjoining Newbury in Berkshire.
